items.title: Stagiaire Développeur Full Stack
items.description: Développement de deux modules dans le cadre d'un outil interne de pilotage des projets, incluant différents aspects financiers et des indicateurs de qualité pour un contrat.
details: During my final year internship, I had the opportunity to work on an internal monitoring tool aiming to provide different project management key indicators to multiple types of users. I was in charge of a financial summary and a quality management overview modules, either interfaced with another internal tool or fully independent.

Thanks to the specifications provided, I was able to build these modules from the backend (data structures, services, management...) to the frontend (global interface, UX, web services consumption...).
I have also faced different stakes concerning security and good practices aspects thanks to a general Fortify analysis and personal reflections given the ressources I was manipulating.
These modules are now integrated to the global solution and will be soon brought to use by different people.

items.title: Stagiraire Développeur Java
items.description: Amélioration des scénarios d’interaction des robots Nao et Pepper par l’introduction d’une nouvelle modélisation à base de graphes de contexte, tout en assurant la robustesse des modèles produits par le biais d’un vérificateur de propriétés dédié.

items.title: Stagiraire Développeur Android
items.description: Plus-value de l’expérience des visiteurs du Muséum de La Rochelle par la mise à disposition d’une application compagnon sur tablettes numériques et le fournissement au personnel d’une visualisation des informations récoltées des différentes visites.

items.title: Stagiraire Développeur Web
items.description: Participation dans plusieurs projets de développement web pour différents clients, impliquant principalement l'étude des besoins tout en apportant des ajouts ou modifications sur du contenu ou des fonctionnalités.

items.title: Master Informatique Parcours Architecte Logiciel
items.result: Mention Bien - La Rochelle Université - Juillet 2020
description: Master's degree attended from September 2018 to June 2020 at La Rochelle University, France. Approched thematics during my studies included web services development, code quality and quality assurance, agile methodologies, concurrent and parallel programming, mobility/GIS, big data and Web 3.0.
Other topics include communication, quality and sustainable development, industrial property, digital rights, research and marketing.

One of my side activities included the role of class representative for which I was the favored interlocutor between students and lecturers and has been involved in the Master's degree's Development Board.

linkedProjects.title: Archive Client for Patient File Consultation

items.title: Cursus Master Ingénierie C.M.I.
description: Complementary five-year university programme focused on communication, business, and research. Additional courses compared to the basic bachelor's master's system were attended, aiming to develop engineering competencies and the ability of abstraction.

items.title: Semestre Erasmus+ - NUIG
description: Erasmus+ semester from September to December 2017 at the National University of Ireland Galway as part of the third year of my bachelor's degree.

items.title: Licence Informatique Parcours Développement Logiciel
description: Bachelor's degree attended from September 2015 to June 2018, including an Erasmus+ semester at NUIG.

items.title: Baccalauréat Scientifique - Sciences de l'Ingénieur
items.description: Baccalauréat Scientifique parcours Sciences de l'Ingénieur obtenu en specialité Physique-Chimie.
